    • Method Detail

      • isAllAdapters

        public boolean isAllAdapters()

      • getIndicesForAdapters

        public List<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Index,List<InternalDataAdapter<?>>>> getIndicesForAdapters(PersistentAdapterStore adapterStore,
                                                                                                           AdapterIndexMappingStore adapterIndexMappingStore,
                                                                                                           IndexStore indexStore)
        Return the set of adapter/index associations. If the adapters are not provided, then look up all of them. If the index is not provided, then look up all of them.

        DataStores are responsible for selecting a single adapter/index per query. For deletions, the Data Stores are interested in all the associations.

        Returns:
        the set of adapter/index associations

      • getBestQueryIndices

        public List<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Index,List<InternalDataAdapter<?>>>> getBestQueryIndices(PersistentAdapterStore adapterStore,
                                                                                                         AdapterIndexMappingStore adapterIndexMappingStore,
                                                                                                         IndexStore indexStore,
                                                                                                         DataStatisticsStore statisticsStore,
                                                                                                         QueryConstraints query)
        This will get all relevant adapter index pairs and then select the best index for each adapter given the constraint. Currently, it determines what is best by the index which can satisfy the most dimensions of the given constraint.
